work.summary: Built distributed microservices and led internal security and testing improvements.
highlights: Handled 1M+ monthly requests using Java (Spring Boot) and Amazon SQS.
Reduced bug reports by 15% via rigorous unit testing.
Integrated Keycloak for internal access control.
Automated testing with Cypress for 100% cross-browser compatibility.
Reduced UI bugs by 40% during QA cycles.
Optimized Golang backend and improved filtering speed by 20%.
Replaced Excel workflows with a web portal, cutting manual effort by 50%.

projects.name: Trajectory Prediction
projects.description: Trained a Social LSTM on Argoverse 2 dataset to predict ego-agent trajectories.
highlights: Achieved 7.98 MSE on validation and 8.67 MSE on test set.
Implemented custom social pooling over 10,000+ multi-agent scenes.

projects.name: CUDA Matrix Multiplication
projects.description: High-throughput CUDA kernel for matrix multiplication using performance tuning techniques.
highlights: 4000 GFLOPS for N=2048 with shared memory, loop unrolling, and coalescing.

awards.title: Google Kickstart Round E
awards.summary: Global rank 375 out of more than 8,000 participants.

awards.title: JEE Advanced
awards.summary: All India Rank 844 out of 0.2 million candidates.
